course_name: Independent Study (Master of Governance and Public Policy)
description: This is a restricted entry course and School consent must be obtained prior to enrollment. Studies in governance and public policy focusing on various areas of the discipline. The precise nature of the course will vary according to availability of staff. Students should contact the school by email to polsis@uq.edu.au for further information. Students will be directed to enroll in this course where appropriate by the Postgraduate Program Convenor. This course is not available as a general elective.
